name: AlienMist (Draxnar)
description:
Prototype inspired on Portal.

Combine differents types of projectiles & use portals to resolve puzzles

Best feature


Controls

  • AWSD: Movement.
  • Right click: Shoot.
  • Number 1: Select fire projectiles
  • Number 2: Select water projectiles
  • Number 3: Select life projectiles
  • Left click: Pick/Leave objects
  • E: Spawn red portal
  • Q: Spawn blue portal
  • X: Combination prediction on receptors
